setDetails.setDescription:
The SOLUNAVAX Index, by Galleon DAO & Beverage Finance, is a structured product built  natively on the Optimism network to enable traders to gain spot exposure to the enormously popular, alternate Layer 1 assets, Solana (SOL), Terra (LUNA) and Avalanche (AVAX) using perpetual products. This is a first in the Set Protocol ecosystem for creating a cross-chain strategy and utilising the new, innovative Perpetual Protocol V2 integration.

The SOLUNAVAX Index follows a strict methodology prescribed by Galleon DAO & Beverage Finance. It is comprised of three single perpetual 1x positions wrapped in Sets (SOL1X, LUNA1X, AVAX1X), also created by Galleon & Beverage, to give maximum flexibility between gaining exposure to the entire theme or individual components. Our 1x perpetual tokens cannot get liquidated and are a novel ETH-native synth token that can be put in Curve pools, traded on exchanges and bridged.

Methodology
Underlying Asset: SOL 1x, LUNA 1x, AVAX 1x
Rebalance Interval: Quarterly
Streaming Fee: 0.5%
setDetails.managerDescription: Galleon DAO is a guild of like-minded strategy methodologists that research, design, and create best-in-class, novel structured products to be distributed through select ecosystem partners and DAO-owned applications (SetSwap).
